Bash(python3 -c "
import json
data = json.load\(open\('/mnt/c/Users/raygo/source/repos/Mental_Health_Database/Scripts/college_targets.json'\)\)
from collections import Counter
states = Counter\(c['state'] for c in data['colleges']\)
print\('Colleges by state:'\)
for state, count in sorted\(states.items\(\)\):
    print\(f'  {state}: {count}'\)
print\(f'\\nTotal: {sum\(states.values\(\)\)}'\)")
